meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you learn to <term>add/subtract a term to/from both sides of an equation</term>. If you start with an equation like <inline-math/> then you will be able to add any term, like for instance <inline-math/>, to both sides of this equation, resulting in <inline-math/>. This also includes subtracting terms. This skill does not include the subsequent simplification of the resulting outcome.</par>
